title: Regression in 3.6.2: ConfigDiagnostic `NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "java.lang.CharSequence.toString()" because "s" is null`
body:
### Describe the bug

### Expected behavior

No error

### Actual behavior

Maven plugin execution fails with NPE in ConfiogDiagnostic

### How to Reproduce?

n/a for now

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

`Linux xxx 5.15.0-89-generic #99-Ubuntu SMP Mon Oct 30 20:42:41 UTC 2023 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux`

### Output of `java -version`

17.0.9

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.6.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven 3.9.6

### Additional information

_No response_
